news.title: Labor market growth slows dramatically in August with U.S. adding just 54,000 jobs, ADP says
news.summary: U.S. private sector hiring rose less than expected in August, according to the ADP. The ADP reports that private sector jobs rose by less than 1% in August.

news.title: T. Rowe Price shares rocket higher after deal where Goldman will invest $1 billion in asset manager
news.summary: Goldman will buy up to $1 billion in T. Rowe Price stock through open-market purchases with the intention to own up to 3.5%.

news.title: Spirit Airlines axes flights in 12 cities as it fights for survival while United, other airlines circle
news.summary: Spirit Airlines is exiting a host of cities as it fights for survival while rival airlines are eyeing its customers. Spirit Airlines is out of a number of cities in the U.S.

news.title: CNBC's Official NFL Team Valuations 2025: Here's how the 32 franchises stack up
news.summary: CNBC ranks the 32 NFL teams on overall franchise value. The value is calculated by CNBC senior sports reporter Michael Ozanian. How does your football team stack up?

news.title: Pulte refuses to say where he got Lisa Cook mortgage fraud ‘tip’
news.summary: "I'm not going to explain our sources and methods," Pulte said on CNBC's "Squawk Box" "I don't know where we get tips from, who are whistleblowers," he said.

news.title: Jobless claims rise to highest level since June, adding to concerns about labor market
news.summary: The labor market tends to weaken quickly once layoffs commence. What worries policymakers is that the labor market tend to weaken rapidly once layoffs begin. The U.S. economy is expected to grow at a faster rate than expected in the second quarter.

news.title: More people earning over $100,000 are doing their back-to-school and holiday shopping at Dollar General and Dollar Tree these days. Here’s why.
news.summary: Higher-income customers are boosting the performance of discount retailers. Dollar Tree and Dollar General are both seeing higher sales and higher profit margins. The company's shares are up more than 10 percent this year.

news.title: ‘She’s a very proud woman:’ My mother, 81, discovered her ‘millions’ in investments are gone. What can I do?
news.summary: “Before this happened, she gave me $50,000 to buy a new vehicle,” he says of his mother. “She gave me a lot of money before this happened.”

news.title: ADP says just 54,000 private jobs created in August. Businesses still hesitant to hire.
news.summary: Privately run businesses created just 54,000 jobs in August, ADP says. The report extends a string of poor employment reports that have raised alarms about the labor market.

news.title: $5,000 gold and other trades that Goldman, JPMorgan say may be coming if the market loses faith in the Fed
news.summary: Investors should diversify into commodities as inflation concerns build, say analysts. Investors should also look for opportunities in emerging markets, they say.
